Ara-Kara, City of Echoes Guide

11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh

Last Updated:August 5, 2025|Changelog

Welcome to the Ara-Kara, City of Echoes Mythic+ guide for the World of Warcraft patch 11.2! This guide covers everything you need to know about your upcoming dungeon runs!

Route

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes

It is recommended to use the Mythic Dungeon Tools addon to look at your route and mob count before the Mythic+ dungeon starts. Below you can see an example of a Weekly Route meant for +10 keys or lower.

Simply import the route into the Mythic Dungeon Tool addon and take a look at it with your group.

Weekly Route

Utility Needs

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes
Bleed
Magic Dispel
Poison
  • Bleeding Jab
    • A stacking Bleed that inflicts physical damage for 8 seconds.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Evoker
      • Cauterizing Flame
    • Paladin
      • Blessing of Protection
  • Tainted Blood
    • A stacking movement speed and healing received reduction.
  • Web Wrap
    • Magic debuff that incapacitates the player for 10 seconds.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Priest
      • Mass Dispel
    • Warlock
      • Singe Magic
  • Venomous Spit
    • Dangerous Poison debuff from Engorged Crawler that inflicts nature damage over time.
  • Cultivated Poisons
    • Poison debuff from the Ki'katal the Harvester boss encounter that inflicts nature damage and erupts waves upon removal.
  • Poison Bolt
    • Stacking Poison debuff inflicting nature damage over time.
      • Interruptible and only casted on the tank.
  • Revolting Volley
    • A Poison debuff inflicting nature damage over time.
      • Interruptible.
  • Venom Volley
    • A Poison debuff inflicting nature damage over time.
      • Interruptible.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Paladin
      • Cleanse Toxins
      • Cleanse         with
        Improved Cleanse         for
        Holy
    • Druid
      • Remove Corruption
      • Nature's Cure         for
        Restoration
    • Monk
      • Detox
      • Detox         with
        Improved Detox         for
        Mistweaver
    • Evoker
      • Expunge         and
        Cauterizing Flame
    • Shaman
      • Poison Cleansing Totem

Avanoxx Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes
Nakt
Atik
Ixin
Engorged Crawler
Jabbing Flyer
Ravenous Crawler
Trilling Attendant
  • Required Kick:
    • Web Bolt
      • Inflicts nature damage to a random target.
  • Call of the Brood
    • Inflicts heavy physical damage over 1.5 seconds.
      • Always be ready to use a defensive cooldown for this cast.
  • Web Spray
    • Inflicts nature damage to all enemies in a cone and leaves some puddles on the ground.
  • Required Kick:
    • Poison Bolt
      • Inflicts nature damage to the target and applies a stacking Poison.
  • Web Spray
    • Inflicts nature damage to all enemies in a cone and leaves some puddles on the ground.
  • Poisonous Cloud
    • Ejects a poisonous cloud towards a random target location inflicting nature damage to any player within it.
  • Required Kick:
    • Horrifying Shrill
      • Long cast causing players within 50 yards to flee in fear for 6 seconds.
    • Web Bolt
      • Inflicts nature damage to a random target.
  • Web Spray
    • Inflicts nature damage to all enemies in a cone and leaves some puddles on the ground.
  • Required Poison Dispel:
    • Venomous Spit
      • Spits venom at a random player, applying Poison inflicting nature damage for 10 seconds.
  • Required Bleed Dispel:
    • Bleeding Jab
      • Jabs a target and applies a stacking Bleed to it.
  • Ambush
    • Leaps at a target, slowing and inflicting physical damage.
  • Required Kick:
    • Web Bolt
      • Inflicts nature damage to a random target.
    • Resonant Barrage
      • Channeling cast, inflicting nature damage to all players every 2 seconds.

Avanoxx

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes
Overview
Alerting Shrill
Gossamer Onslaught
Voracious Bite
  • Always be stacked together during this boss encounter but be wary of your positioning whenever Starved Crawlers are alive. Due to
    Insatiable    , Avanoxx will eat any Starved Crawler that reaches her and increase her damage done which will most likely lead to a wipe.
  • Press big defensive cooldowns during
    Alerting Shrill     cast and small ones during
    Gossamer Onslaught    .
    • Additionally, during
      Gossamer Onslaught      , try to also move together as a group around the boss or in a line.
  • Always reposition closer as a group to the new add wave whenever they spawn to have an easier time dealing with them.
  • Avanoxx releases a loud screech, calling forth Starved Crawlers from their eggs and inflicting physical damage every 0.5 seconds to all players for 3 seconds.
    • Starved Crawler fixates a random player and increases damage done by 10% every 3 seconds. This effect stacks.
  • Avanoxx slings toxic webs in all directions, inflicting nature damage every second to all players for 5 seconds. Additionally, this leaves behind
    Vile Webbing     at the targets locations, which inflicts nature damage to players within 2 yards of each impact.
  • Vile Webbing     ensnares players standing within, reducing movement speed by 50% and inflicting nature damage every second. This effect stacks and upon 5 applications, the webbing develops into a
    Web Wrap    .
    • Web Wrap       is a Magic debuff that incapacitates the player and can be dispelled.
  • Avanoxx leaps to her primary target and unleashes consecutive bites. Each bite inflicts physical damage and the final bite further increases damage taken by 50% for 10 seconds.

Anub'zekt Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes
Bloodworker
Bloodstained Assistant
Bloodstained Webmage
Hulking Bloodguard
Sentry Stagshell
  • Charge
    • Charges towards a target, inflicting physical damage.
  • Extraction Strike
    • Inflicts physical damage to the target and heals equal to the damage inflicted.
  • Required Kick:
    • Web Bolt
      • Inflicts nature damage to a random target.
    • Revolting Volley
      • Inflicts nature damage to all players within 100 yards and applies a Poison to them for 10 seconds.
  • Locust Swarm
    • Inflicts nature damage to all players for 8 seconds.
  • Impale
    • Frontal cone, inflicting physical damage to all players it hits and knocking them back.
  • Alarm Shrill
    • Long cast, summoning a Hulking Bloodguard and alerting all allies within 50 yards.
      • Never let this cast go through and try to stop it with any crowd control available.

Anub'zekt

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes
Overview
Eye of the Swarm
Infestation
Burrow Charge
Impale
  • Always be in melee and keep in mind that
    Burrow Charge     always goes on the furthest target.
    • Additionally, try to position the boss and aim the charge to the closest wall.
  • Anub'zekt will periodically spawn waves of caster adds that you will need to kill and interrupt. Remember that if you run out of kicks, you can still stop them with crowd control if needed.
  • Always be wary of
    Infestation     incoming and be ready to react to it with a defensive cooldown.
  • During the
    Eye of the Swarm     follow the safe space and as a tank always aim
    Impale     behind the group.
  • Upon reaching 100 energy, Anub'zekt calls forth a massive swarm surrounding the arena. While within the biting insect swarm, players rapidly gain applications of
    Ceaseless Swarm    .
    • Important to know that the "safe" zone during the swarm is following the tank which means that he can dictate where the "safe" zone is going to be.
  • Anub'zekt calls a swarm to feast upon a random player, inflicting nature damage every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds.
    • Upon removal, they will form into a
      Ceaseless Swarm       and hunt for more prey.
  • Anub'zekt burrows through a random player, inflicting physical damage and knocking back players in his path. At the end of his path, he erupts from the earth, inflicting physical damage and knocking back players within 13 yards.
    • Goes on the furthest player in range thus can be baited on specific players.
  • Anub'zekt launches a cone of spikes through the earth at his current target, inflicting physical damage and knocking back players hit.

Ki'katal the Harvester Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes
Reinforced Drone
Winged Carrier
Blood Overseer
Black Blood
  • Tainted Blood
    • Applies a stacking debuff, inflicting shadow damage and reducing the target's movement speed and healing received.
  • Dashing Strike
    • Dashes to a random target, inflicting physical damage.
  • Required Kick:
    • Venom Volley
      • Blasts all players with Poison, inflicting nature damage immediately and every 2 seconds for 12 seconds.
  • Erupting Webs
    • Spawns several pools on the ground, inflicting nature damage and stunning players struck.
  • Required Kick:
    • Grasping Blood
      • Roots the target in place for 1 minute.

Ki'katal the Harvester

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes
Overview
Cosmic Singularity
Cultivated Poisons
Erupting Webs
  • Spread around the boss and try not to aim at each other with waves from
    Cultivated Poison     debuff.
    • Try to have a defensive cooldown or health potion whenever you are afflicted by this debuff.
  • Always keep an eye on the amount of Bloodworkers and pools from them around you and make sure to have a few available during the
    Cosmic Singularity     cast so you can use them to root yourself and counter the suck.
    • If none are available, remember that many classes can survive the suck on their own with their movement abilities by pressing them at the very end of the suck.
  • Be careful with your AoE crowd control spells and interrupts to not grief your teammates as any interrupt or crowd control will remove the root from Bloodworkers.
  • Ki'katal the Harvester pulls in all players and begins create a spatial distortion. Upon finishing the cast, all players within 10 yards suffer shadow damage and are knocked away.
    • Players struck by
      Cosmic Singularity       are affected by
      Faded       debuff and have their damage done reduced by 75% and damage taken increased by 75% for 20 seconds.
  • Ki'katal the Harvester injects a growing poison in 3 players, inflicting nature damage every second for 8 seconds. Upon removal it erupts forth in waves and inflicts nature damage and an additional nature damage every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds to players struck.
    • This debuff is a Poison and can be dispelled, but will still erupt upon removal.
  • Ki'katal the Harvester causes several spiderweb eruptions to occur, inflicting nature damage and stunning players struck for 3 seconds.

Dungeon Extras + Specials

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes

Ara-Kara, City of Echoes dungeon has a special tailoring profession item that can greatly help you defeat some of the monsters inside the instance. There are total of 4 of them that are highlighted as red dots on the picture below.

Blessing of the Sacred Flame

  • Requires at least 25
    Tailoring     skill.
  • Once interacted you get a 60 seconds duration buff during which you can use an extra action button to stun any non-boss npc for 12 seconds but only once.
  • One of the best targets for this item is the Nakt mini-boss and Hulking Bloodguards in the end.

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Ara-Kara, City of Echoes
Trinkets/Jewelry
Weapons
